feedback: I really liked the service, but it's a bit too expensive for me right now. Would love to come back if there are any discounts in the future.
The product is good but lacks some key features that I need for my workflow, especially in the analytics dashboard.
I found another service that better suits my needs at the moment.
The price increase was too steep for me to continue. The service is great, but not at this price point.
The platform has too many features that I don't use, which makes it feel cluttered and hard to navigate.
I had several issues that weren't resolved by customer support in a timely manner, which affected my business.
I'm taking a break for now but plan to return in a few months. I'll be back!
